thread.section_title: Hotel Relais Saint-Germain - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect Paris hotel
thread.title_full: Perfect Paris hotel - Review of Hotel Relais Saint-Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Pat M
title: Perfect Paris hotel
text: I stayed one night on the way to a business stop elsewhere. I had dinner at L'avant Comptoir which is fabulous. Great wine by the glass and wonderful, world class small plates. The room was very well decorated and the bed linens were the perfect cotton. The quality of the breakfast was an unexpected surprise, but it shouldn't have been, given the quality of the food at dinner and the perfect class of the hotel. This is really the perfect place to stay in Paris.
